edu.uw.spl.exchange

Class NetworkExchangeProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.spl.exchange.NetworkExchangeProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.StockExchange

    public class NetworkExchangeProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.StockExchange
    Operates as a client for interacting with an exchange via a network. The methods encode the method request as a text-based procotol, per ProtocolConstants, and send the command to the NetworkExchangeAdapter implementation; the methods then receive the response, decode it, and return a result The information exchanged will either be Commands based on the text-based protocol, (to get a quote or execute a trade, etc), or change Events (price change, market open/closed). The NetowrkExchangeAdapter implementation will send multicast messages representing exchange events via a separate thread. Event messages will be transformed into the appropriate event object and then propagated to registered listeners
